title: Engineer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Construct a sentry at night.
- Place a constructed sentry at someone's house. The sentry will deal a Powerful attack to 1 random visitor who is not a member of the same faction as the player whose house the sentry is placed at. You may not target yourself.
- Destroy a constructed sentry.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only have 1 constructed sentry at a time.
- Once a sentry attacks a player, it will disappear.

desc:
Post 380
*I solve practical problems. For instance, how am I gonna stop some big mean Mother-Hubbard from tearin' me a structurally superfluous new behind? The answer? Use a gun. And if that don't work, use more gun.*
